items.title: Filtering, not search or lists -  viewing your feeds
items.content_html:
I wonder if @manton could bring in more filters for your timeline that you can use to turn on and off (in app) such as Emoji so turn all üìö on / off / integrated etc. Would be nice to see a different approach to lists / search for sure.

I‚Äôve gone into the web settings and turned off people you don‚Äôt follow mentions option but would be cool to flick them back on perhaps filters are;

solo / hide / intergrate (default)

UI would need to be nice and quick. Been thinking a little about filtering in other contexts maybe an idea üí°

Also could be good for organsing your own posts and filtering for review / reuse. Note to self need to look how a markdown doc keeps emoji.
NHS 70 years on ! Excellent service but needs so much more support and funding. üë©‚Äç‚öïÔ∏èüë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è

For focused writing, Markdown is your best friend I love markdown and here is a quick update to date primer on why its awesome for writing via @adders

Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes, including you.

  • Anne Lamott

via @thoughtshrapnel Hoping to unplug in August myself.

Writing a medium size blog post with inline images for Micro.blog. Started in my fav fast editor FoldingText need to move to Ulysses but that won‚Äôt publish to MB (atm) probably going to have to get MarsEdit now to be fair. You can‚Äôt have too many markdown editors can you?
